metadata.title: CVE-2024-27436 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ALSA:usb-audio: Stop parsing channels bits when all channels are found. If a usbaudio device sets more bits than the amount of channels it could writeoutside of the map array.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
